examples.example: 水族馆里的食人鱼在工作人员的精心照料下茁壮成长。

translate.english: The piranhas in the aquarium thrive under the careful care of the staff.

examples.example: 海洋馆里的食人鱼在饲养员的悉心呵护下欢快地游弋。

translate.english: The piranhas in the aquarium swim happily under the careful care of the breeder.

examples.example: 可爱的食人鱼在自己的天地中自由自在地生活着。

translate.english: Lovely piranhas live freely in their own world.
